Lash Lift Course

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.1″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#486066″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_4_font_size=”16px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lash lifting has become a global phenomenon. Almost every woman can benefit from this service. And men too!

Student Benefits:

Personalized Training to ensure a successful learning experience
Suitable for short and long lashes
Allows for perfect positioning of the lashes
Reduces your chances of over curling lashes
A wonderful alternative to lash extensions
Earning potential of $90-$120 per 30 minutes!

Course Includes:

One Shot Lash Lift Kit
Student Manual
Starter Lash/Brow Tint Supplies
Client Forms
Hands-on training with live models

COST:

$645

Hurry up and schedule your training today!
